edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.janeway.modules

Class ModuleLoader<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.janeway.modules.ModuleLoader<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the modules to load

    public class ModuleLoader<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Loads modules of the given type from JAR files located in the given directory.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.net.URLClassLoader classLoader
      The class loader
      (package private) java.util.List<java.lang.String> classNames
      A list of class names that contain modules
      private java.lang.String configPath
      The directory where the module config file is located
      private java.util.List<java.net.URL> jarNames
      A list of URL objects pointing to the jar files
      (package private) java.util.List<java.lang.String> modPaths
      A list of directories where module jars are located
      private java.util.List<T> modules
      List of loaded modules
      private java.net.URL[] urlArray
      An array of URL objects, to be passed to the class loader

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModuleLoader(java.lang.String configPath)
      Creates a new ModuleLoader that loads modules of type from the given directory.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.util.List<java.net.URL> getJarNames(java.lang.String path)
      Builds a list of all of the JAR files in the given directory.
      private void getModuleClassNames()
      Looks at the manifest.txt file in each JAR file and adds the class names contained in each to the list of class names to load.
      java.util.List<T> getModules()
      Returns the list of instantiated modules
      private void readConfig()
      Reads the configuration file at path and parses out the module directories and the names of the module classes.
